name: dca
publications: A.W.M. Dress, G. Fullen, S.W. Perrey, A Divide and Conquer Approach to Multiple Alignment, Proceedings of the Third International Conference on Intelligent Systems for Molecular Biology (ISMB 95), AAAI Press, Menlo Park, CA, USA, 107-113, 1995.
J. Stoye, Multiple Sequence Alignment with the Divide-and-Conquer Method, Gene 211(2), GC45-GC56, 1998. (Gene-COMBIS)
description: Divide-and-Conquer Multiple Sequence Alignment (DCA) produce fast, high quality simultaneous multiple sequence alignments of amino acid, RNA, or DNA sequences
